documents.document: why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out - Oliver James
Maybe some things aren't meant to be known. maybe there just meant to be accepted. - Wendy Mass
It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can do only a little. Do what you can. - Sydney Smith
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly. - Robert F. Kennedy
I don't know what they are called, the spaces between secondsâ€“ but I think of you always in those intervals. - Salvador Plascencia
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times - always with the same person. - Mignon McLaughlin
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
This is your heart.Keep it locked until the chap turns up who has the key. - Jean Webster
Every now and then one paints a picture that seems to have opened a door and serves as a stepping stone to other things. - Pablo Picasso
A woman who surrenders her freedom need not surrender her dignity. - Wally Lamb
Life is 10 percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it. - Lou Holtz

If you don't feel as close to God today as you did yesterday, who moved? - Chris Heimerdinger
Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
No one can go back and make a brand new start, my friend, but anyone can start from here and make a brand new end — Dan Zadra
He who refuses to embrace a unique opportunity loses the prize as surely as if he had tried and failed. - William James
Love is an irreresisistible desire to be irresistibily desired. - Mark Twain
People are going to say what they want to say and think what they want to think, and I can't change their minds. - Hilary Duff

I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not. - Kurt Cobain
I prepare for the worst, but hope for the best. - Jackie Chan
Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses. - William Arthur Ward
Th only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing. - John Powell
I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion'. - Muhammad Ali
Life is an effort that deserves a better cause. - Karl Kraus
There is no dishonor in losing the race. There is only dishonor in not racing because you are afraid to lose. - Garth Stein
Love is a drama of contradictions. - Franz Kafka
If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito. - Dalai Lama XIV
It is not the absence of defensiveness that characterizes learning teams but the way defensiveness is faced - Peter M. Senge
You know how they say you only hurt the ones you love? Well, it works both ways. - Chuck Palahniuk
Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve - W. Clement Stone
Under Adverse conditions - some people break down,some break records - Shiv Khera
The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should be treated with caution. - J.K. Rowling
The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live. - Elbert Hubbard
Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes. - Oscar Wilde
You have to know your own truth and stick to it. And never despair. Never give up. There's always hope. - Aidan Chambers
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent - Victor Hugo
You're not forsaken. You're chosen for purpose. - Vanessa Richardson
Sometimes I think the fear of dying is really a fear that you're not living the life you want. - Dashka Slater
Everything you need to know you have learned through your journey. - Paulo Coelho

May you get more out of life than a cup of tea. - Rebecca St. James
Life is like a novel. Its filled with suspense. You have no idea what is going to happen until you turn the page. - Sidney Sheldon
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
You will receive everything you need when you stop asking for what you do not need - Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj
True love begins when nothing is looked for in return. - Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry
To give pleasure to a single heart by a single act is better than a thousand heads bowing in prayer. - Mahatma Gandhi
Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit. - Molière
If you do not have courage, you may not have the opportunity to use any of your other virtues. - Samuel Jackson
One of the things that makes a dead leaf fall to the ground is the bud of the new leaf that pushes it off the limb. - Jan Karon
Study as if you were going to live forever; live as if you were going to die tomorrow. - Maria Mitchell
A thousand words leave not the same deep impression as does a single deed. - Henrik Ibsen
You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them. - Michael Jordan
Go as far as you can see. When you get there, you can see farther. - Thomas Carlyle
Tough times never last, but tough people do. - Robert H. Schuller
Only when we give joyfully, without hesitation or thought of gain, can we truly know what love means. - Leo Buscaglia
Two people in love,isolated from this world,that's beautiful. - Milan Kundera
To realize one's Personal Legend is a person's only real obligation. - Paulo Coelho
The most effective people are those who can "hold" their vision while remaining committed to seeing current reality clearly - Peter M. Senge
Capacity for love in its higher forms seems to be peculiarly human although even in humans it is still peculiar. - Jeanette Winterson
Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save. - Will Rogers
Under Adverse conditions - some people break down,some break records - Shiv Khera
Any accomplishment is not fulfilled without true realization of satisfaction in heart and soul. - Santosh Kalwar
Death is our constant companion, and it is death that gives each person's life its true meaning. - Paulo Coelho
We all can be only who we are, no more, no less. - Terry Goodkind
Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out. - Michael Burke
Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on. - Hiromu Arakawa
The greatest beauty is organic wholeness, the wholeness of life and things, the divine beauty of the universe. - Robinson Jeffers
Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend. - Albert Camus
If you can't do great things, do small things in a great way. - Napoleon Hill
The willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life is the source from which self-respect springs. - Joan Didion
Traveling in the company of those we love is home in motion. - Leigh Hunt
People will always give you advice, it is you who should decide either to try them or live with them. - Santosh Kalwar
Life is a succession of moments. To live each one is to succeed. - Corita Kent
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. - Confucius
Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty. - Thomas S. Monson
What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality. - Plutarch
It's a sad day when you find out that it's not accident or time or fortune, but just yourself that kept things from you. - Hellman, Lillian
To live is to change, to acquire the words of a story, and that is the only celebration we mortals really know. - Barbara Kingsolver
The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over. - Nicholas Sparks
Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but a true friend will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down. - Oprah Winfrey
Worry is most often a prideful way of thinking that you have more control over life and its circumstances than you actually do. - June Hunt
Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are - Kurt Cobain
Gradually the healing took place, seeming as it always does that it wasn't taking place. - Ursula K. Le Guin
Happiness consists in always aspiring perfection, the pause in any level in perfection is the pause of happiness - Leo Tolstoy
Profound joy of the heart is like a magnet that indicates the path of life. - Mother Teresa
Sometimes I think the fear of dying is really a fear that you're not living the life you want. - Dashka Slater
Myth is much more important and true than history. History is just journalism and you know how reliable that is. - Joseph Campbell
So many things are possible as long as you don't know they are impossible - Mildred D. Taylor
